mean_en: to tell two or more people who have not met before what each other’s names are; to tell somebody what your name is; to be the main speaker in a television or radio show, who gives details about the show and who presents the people who are in it; to tell the audience the name of the person who is going to speak or perform
sentence: Students will introduce themselves on the first day at school.
sentence_trans: 开学第一天，学生们都要介绍自己。
word_etyma: intro向内，入内 + duce引 → 引进 → introduce引入，介绍
